creditline: Courtesy of the artist and Goodman Gallery, South Africa
description: black and white photograph of a tiled outdoor plaza with a tall building in the background; a fountain with horses on top on the left side and a sculpture of a man's head on the right side
title: Monuments to the Republic of South Africa (left), the late Prime minister, JG Strijdom (right), and the headquarters of Volkskas Bank, Pretoria.
